title: Bézier Watch Official
summary: The official Android Wear edition of Jack Frigaard's Bézier Clock - Full Version
description: DOWNLOAD THE FREE TRIAL VERSION HERE: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.jackf.bezierwatch.freeThis is the official Android Wear version of Jack Frigaard's Bézier Clock (http://jackf.net/bezier-clock/). With the same mesmerising animations, it'll look great on your wrist. This is version allows full customization of the following:    -  Foreground & background colours    -  4 different animation styles    -  12/24h time    -  6 different digit layouts    -  Digit stroke widthOn the free version these are customizable but are reset to defaults every 3 minutes. descriptionHTML:
DOWNLOAD THE FREE TRIAL VERSION HERE: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.jackf.bezierwatch.free

This is the official Android Wear version of Jack Frigaard's Bézier Clock (http://jackf.net/bezier-clock/). With the same mesmerising animations, it'll look great on your wrist.

This is version allows full customization of the following:

- Foreground & background colours
- 4 different animation styles
- 12/24h time
- 6 different digit layouts
- Digit stroke width

On the free version these are customizable but are reset to defaults every 3 minutes. You can download the free version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.jackf.bezierwatch.free

All layouts are compatible with both round & square watches.
comments: Different, very friendly First time I feel I need to give stars. With so many watch faces,and they all look similar. Works, looks perfect on lg round.

Great watch face and responsive dev I really like this watch face; very configurable and the animation is smooth. Had a small bug when I first bought it, and the developer was very responsive and fixed it quickly.
Incredibly Broken It's not working at all on my Asus Zenwatch. I expected better. Please update and fix because I like the minimalistic and animation heavy idea for the watch face.
recentChanges: Fixed problem where cards would prevent the watchface from showing.
